ComicInfo.Summary:
Dartmoor, Part 2: Savage, Frost, and Silk escape into the swamp as the moor's monsters follow their scent due to dried blood sewn into Frost's prison uniform.
Flesh Book 1 Part 11: Reagan and the gang tour a Trans-Time Base, whilst tyrannosaurs, including the fuzzy kind, amass outside.
Robot Wars, Part 2: A nurse's dropped soldering lance reactivates Call-Me-Kenneth on live TV, who promptly appeals to robots to strike back.
Dan Dare Part 11: Commander Monday destroys the remaining Biogs, but when Dare returns to Lunaciti, he faces court martial, punishable by death!
Operation Death-Drive!: Probe needs to get military expert Meisser to Paris, 1289 miles away, in 12 hours by car.
Harlem Heroes Part 11: Gruber escapes but not before putting Sammy out of commission for good. Will the mystery villain get his way?
